summary: Intro call with Jane Doe, VP Sales at Acme Corp. Discussed their current outbound pipeline challenges and how OpenClaw can help automate lead enrichment and follow-up. Jane expressed strong interest in a pilot program. Budget approved for Q1. Decision expected within two weeks.

actionItems.description: Send pricing proposal with pilot terms
Share API documentation for CRM integration
Introduce engineering lead for technical deep-dive

nextStep: Follow-up call scheduled for Feb 14 to review proposal
